titles.title: Saving Our Mainstreet American Locations for Leisure and Shopping Act of 2023
Saving Our Mainstreet American Locations for Leisure and Shopping Act of 2023
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude certain discharges of indebtedness secured by real property from income.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Saving Our Mainstreet American Locations for Leisure and Shopping Act of 2023
This bill excludes from gross income, for income tax purposes, income attributable to certain discharges of commercial or retail indebtedness secured by real property.
